
DeepaMehta uses a jQuery UI custom build.

Basic Theme: "Smoothness"

Font Settings:
    Family: "Lucida Grande", Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
    Weight: normal
    Size  : 1em

Corner Radius: 0

Components (9):
    Core
    Widget
    Mouse
    Position

    Draggable
    Resizable
    Sortable

    Autocomplete
    Button
    Dialog
    Menu
